sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import Swatch from '../../components/Swatch/Swatch';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"default-theme"}}>{`Default theme`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can refer to a color from the theme using `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`theme.colors.<COLOR_NAME>`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"colors"}}>{`Colors`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"primary-colors"}}>{`Primary Colors`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="primary"/>
<Swatch colorName="secondary"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"neutrals"}}>{`Neutrals`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="black"/>
<Swatch colorName="washedOutBlack"/>
<Swatch colorName="darkestGrey"/>
<Swatch colorName="darkGrey"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightGrey"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestGrey"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"blues"}}>{`Blues`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkBlue"/>
<Swatch colorName="baseBlue"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightBlue"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestBlue"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"greens"}}>{`Greens`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkGreen"/>
<Swatch colorName="baseGreen"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightGreen"/>
<Swatch colorName="secondaryGreen"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"puralls"}}>{`Puralls`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkestPlurall"/>
<Swatch colorName="darkPlurall"/>
<Swatch colorName="basePlurall"/>
<Swatch colorName="secondaryPlurall"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightPlurall"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestPlurall"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"reds"}}>{`Reds`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkRed"/>
<Swatch colorName="baseRed"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightRed"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestRed"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"whites"}}>{`Whites`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="whiteSmoke"/>
<Swatch colorName="whiteSnow"/>
<Swatch colorName="white"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"violets"}}>{`Violets`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkViolet"/>
<Swatch colorName="baseViolet"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightViolet"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestViolet"/>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"yellows"}}>{`Yellows`}</MDXTag>
<Swatch colorName="darkYellow"/>
<Swatch colorName="baseYellow"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightYellow"/>
<Swatch colorName="lightestYellow"/>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage-in-code"}}>{`Usage in code`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-javascript","metastring":null}}>{`import styled, { css } from 'react-emotion';
import theme from 'plurall-ui/themes'

const Box = styled('div')\`
  \${()) => css\`
    background-color: \${theme.colors.black};
    color: \${theme.colors.lightGreen};
  \`};
\`;
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"best-practices-for-using-color"}}>{`Best practices for using color`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Don't refer to hex values in your code (e.g. `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`#000000`}</MDXTag>{`) but rather use the
colors via the theme (e.g. `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`theme.colors.black`}</MDXTag>{`).`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
